name: drift game NYC GameJam
description:
game made for NYC Game jam in seven days is still in development. contains some bugs.

the game contains:

  • drive system 
  • mini map
  • first and third person camera
  • store(under development)
  • music and sounds
  • 3 cars ready to go (I'm going to add more cars)

future updates: 

  • more cars 
  • ramps 
  • car position reset 
  • destructible objects around the city 
  • improve drift scoring system 
  • loading screen
  •  main menu 
  • pause menu
